newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian Treasury sets next state note issue.
newsitem.headline: Belgian Treasury sets next state note issue.

text.p: The Belgian Treasury said in a statement on Monday it set the coupon for the third issue of its five-year state notes, extendable to seven years, at 4.70 percent.

The first coupon for the third issue of a 3/5/7 note (which bears a revisable coupon and put options at three, five and seven years and with a guaranteed minimum coupon) was set at 3.80 percent. The second and third coupons were set at 4.80 and 5.60 percent respectively.
The issue price for each state note will be set on December 10 at the latest, the Treasury said. Subscriptions run from December 11 to 17 inclusive.
